item.title: Acidic Fire Ammunition
item.fluff: Green flames burn and spread boiling acid in all directions from where this ammunition hits

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackArea burst 1 within weapon range (each creature in the burst); Item's level +2 vs. Reflex
Hit1d6 fire damage, and ongoing 5 acid damage (save ends).
Level 102d6 fire damage, and ongoing 5 acid damage.
Level 153d6 fire damage, and ongoing 5 acid damage.
Level 203d6 fire damage, and ongoing 10 acid damage.
Level 255d6 fire damage, and ongoing 10 acid damage.
Level 304d6 fire damage, and ongoing 15 acid damage.
MissHalf damage.

item.title: Acid Ammunition
item.fluff: When it hits, the container in this ammunition releases a spray of acid

block.name: Property
block.line: When using this ammunition, you use the listed attack bonus instead of your own. You add your weapon's proficiency bonus to attack, but not its enhancement bonus or other modifiers.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackRanged weapon (one creature); Item's level + 2 vs Reflex
Hit 2d6 acid damage.
Level 62d6 acid damage, and ongoing 5 acid damage (save ends).
Level 113d6 acid damage, and ongoing 5 acid damage (save ends).
Level 163d6 acid damage, and ongoing 10 acid damage (save ends).
Level 215d6 acid damage, and ongoing 10 acid damage (save ends).
Level 265d6 acid damage, and ongoing 15 acid damage (save ends).
MissHalf damage.

item.title: Attention-Stealing Ammunition
item.fluff: This bright red ammunition draws your target's immediate attention

block.name: Property
block.line: When you hit an enemy with an attack using this ammunition, you mark that enemy until the end of your next turn.
While marked by you in this manner, whenever the enemy makes an attack that doesn't include you as a target, the ammunition strikes the target again for 1d6 damage per plus.

item.title: Bending Ammunition
item.fluff: Whisper a direction to this warped ammunition, and it bends around obstacles

block.name: Property
block.line: You count as having line of effect to the target of your attack as long as you have line of effect to any square adjacent to it, but it gains the benefit of cover if you do not have line of effect to it.

item.title: Biting Ammunition
item.fluff: This missile takes flight as a winged, venomous snake
item.headline: RequirementThis ammunition can only be created for Bows and Crossbows

block.name: Property
block.line: When you hit an enemy with an attack using this ammunition, that enemy also takes ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends).
Aftereffect5 poison damage.
Level 15Ongoing 10 poison damage.
Level 20Ongoing 10 poison damage; 10 poison damage.
Level 25Ongoing 15 poison damage; 10 poison damage.
Level 30Ongoing 15 poison damage; 15 poison damage.

item.title: Clinging Fire Ammunition
item.fluff: The thick substance stored in this ammunition sears the target with ongoing flames

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackRanged weapon (one creature); Item's level +2 vs. Reflex
Hit The target takes ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends).
CritThe target takes a -5 penalty to its first save against this ongoing damage.
AftereffectOngoing 5 fire damage (save ends).
Level 13 or 18Ongoing 15 fire damage; Ongoing 10 fire damage.
Level 23 or 28Ongoing 20 fire damage; ongoing 10 fire damage.
MissThe target takes ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).
Level 18, 23 or 28Ongoing 10 fire damage.

item.title: Fire Ammunition
item.fluff: When the container in this ammunition shatters, it fills an area in flame

block.name: Property
block.line: When using this ammunition, you use the listed attack bonus instead of your own. You add your weapon's proficiency bonus to attack, but not its enhancement bonus or other modifiers.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackArea burst 1 within weapon range (each creature in the burst); Item's level + 2 vs Reflex
Hit 1d6 fire damage.
Level 72d6 fire damage.
Level 124d6 fire damage.
Level 175d6 fire damage.
Level 226d6 fire damage.
Level 277d6 fire damage.
MissHalf damage.

item.title: Firestorm Ammunition
item.fluff: The charred wood of this ammunition seems to shimmer with heat

block.name: Property
block.line: When you hit an enemy using this ammunition, that enemy and each creature adjacent to it take 1d6 fire damage per this ammunition's plus.

item.title: Freezing Ammunition
item.fluff: The main construction of this ammunition is shaved from unmelting ice

block.name: Property
block.line: When you hit an enemy with an attack using this ammunition, that enemy takes +1d6 extra cold damage per plus, and is slowed until the start of your next turn.

item.title: Frost Ammunition
item.fluff: The ceramic container in this ammunition explodes in an icy haze when it hits, crippling its target with numbing cold

block.name: Property
block.line: When using this ammunition, you use the listed attack bonus instead of your own. You add your weapon's proficiency bonus to attack, but not its enhancement bonus or other modifiers.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackRanged 5/10 (one creature); Item's level + 2 vs Reflex
Hit 1d6 cold damage, and the target is slowed until the end of its next turn.
Level 72d6 cold damage, and the target is slowed until the end of its next turn.
Level 122d6 cold damage, and the target is slowed and cannot make reactive strikes until the end of its next turn.
Level 173d6 cold damage, and the target is slowed and cannot make reactive strikes until the end of its next turn.
Level 224d6 cold damage, and the target is slowed, cannot make reactive strikes, and grants combat advantage until the end of its next turn.
Level 274d6 cold damage, and the target is slowed, cannot make reactive strikes, and grants combat advantage until the end of its next turn.
MissHalf damage.

item.title: Lightning Ammunition
item.fluff: This ammunition's blue and white streaks thrum with energy

block.name: Property
block.line: When you hit an enemy with an attack using this ammunition, that enemy takes +1d6 extra lightning damage per plus, and and takes a -4 penalty to triggered attack rolls.
Level 13 or 18-6 penalty.
Level 23 or 28-8 penalty.

item.title: Onslaught Ammunition
item.fluff: This black ammunition trails a bright pennant, flagging its target

block.name: Property
block.line: When you hit an enemy with an attack using this ammunition, each ally that can see that enemy gains a +1 item bonus to attack rolls against it until her or she hits it, or until the end of the encounter, whichever comes first.

item.title: Shadowshaft Ammunition
item.fluff: A dark haze trails behind this ammunition as you fire it, exploding in a burst of clinging shadow upon impact

block.name: Property
block.line: After making an attack using this ammunition, whether that attack was a hit or miss, it creates a zone of shadows in a burst 1 centered on the target until the end of the encounter.
The zone is heavily obscured.

item.title: Shock Ammunition
item.fluff: This ammunition shatters on impact, releasing two clouds that quickly coalesce and release a dazzling blast of energy

block.name: Property
block.line: When using this ammunition, you use the listed attack bonus instead of your own. You add your weapon's proficiency bonus to attack, but not its enhancement bonus or other modifiers.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackArea burst 1 within weapon range (each creature in the burst); Item's level +2 vs. Reflex
Hit 1d6 lightning damage.
Level 92d6 lightning damage.
Level 144d6 lightning damage.
Level 195d6 lightning damage.
Level 246d6 lightning damage.
Level 297d6 lightning damage.
EffectThe target takes a -2 penalty to all attack rolls until the end of its next turn.
Level 19, 24, or 29: -2 penalty to all attack rolls (save ends).

item.title: Sliver-Strike Ammunition
item.fluff: When it strikes, this ammunition splits, spraying nearby creatures with shards of steel

block.name: Property
block.line: When you hit an enemy with an attack using this ammunition, each creature other than the target in a burst 2 centered on the target takes damage equal to 3 + twice this ammunition's enhancement bonus.
If you make an attack that deals have damage on a miss, you also deal half of this damage on a miss.

item.title: Spider Ammunition
item.fluff: This web-strewn piece of ammunition envelops the enemy when it hits

block.name: Property
block.line: When you hit an enemy using this ammunition, that enemy and each creature adjacent to it is slowed until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Surprise Ammunition
item.fluff: This winking ammunition blinks in and out, so your target can't see it coming

block.name: Property
block.line: When you attack an enemy using this ammunition, you gain combat advantage against that enemy for that attack.

item.title: Tanglefoot Ammunition
item.fluff: This bulky ammunition contains a sticky gel than can immobilize foes

block.name: Property
block.line: When using this ammunition, you use the listed attack bonus instead of your own. You add your weapon's proficiency bonus to attack, but not its enhancement bonus or other modifiers.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackRanged 5/10 (one creature); item's level +2 vs. Reflex
Hit The target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
AftereffectThe target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
MissThe target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Tethering Ammunition
item.fluff: You fire this ammunition at an enemy, and one side sticks to the creature while other bonds with the ground

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackRanged weapon (one creature); item's level +2 vs. Reflex
Hit The target cannot move more than 3 squares from the space it occupies when it is hit (save ends).
CritThe target takes a -5 penalty to its saving throws against this effect.
The target has a -5 penalty to save against this effect on any turn that it did not move at least 2 squares.
MissThe target treats all squares beyond 3 squares from the space it occupies when missed as difficult terrain until the end of its next turn.

item.title: Thunder ammunition
item.fluff: On impact, the clay sphere of this ammunition unleashes a clap of thunder that can deafen creatures and knock them back

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackArea burst 1 within weapon range (each creature in the burst); Item's level +2 vs. Fortitude
Hit1d6 thunder damage, and the target is pushed 1 square from the center of the burst, and deafened (save ends).
Level 102d6 thunder damage.
Level 154d6 thunder damage.
Level 205d6 thunder damage, and pushed at least 1 square and up to 2 squares.
Level 256d6 thunder damage, and pushed at least 1 square and up to 2 squares.
Level 307d6 thunder damage, and pushed at least 1 square and up to 2 squares.
